1736.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|105|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|107|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and did|92|117|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds,|130|155|239$طُوبَىٰ|blessedness|99|124|9452$لَهُمْ|(is) for them|103|116|98$وَحُسْنُ|and a beautiful|119|336|9453$مَــَٔابٍ|place of return.|123|340|9454$

1737.verse: كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|84|702$أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ|We have sent you|141|155|1101$فِىٓ|to|48|62|89$أُمَّةٍ|a nation|74|88|3159$قَدْ|verily|55|69|1097$خَلَتْ|have passed away|143|157|3295$مِن قَبْلِهَآ|before it|103|110|9455$أُمَمٌ|nations,|73|79|5564$لِّتَتْلُوَاْ|so that you might recite|181|194|9456$عَلَيْهِمُ|to them|73|86|602$ٱلَّذِىٓ|what|65|78|138$أَوْحَيْنَآ|We revealed|102|114|4640$إِلَيْكَ|to you,|68|80|45$وَهُمْ|while they|88|94|256$يَكْفُرُونَ|disbelieve|96|105|608$بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ‌ۚ|in the Most Gracious.|161|179|9457$قُلْ|Say,|50|68|765$هُوَ|"He|48|66|298$رَبِّى|(is) my Lord,|104|122|2902$لَآ|(there is) no|103|121|30$إِلَـٰهَ|god|53|62|2266$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$هُوَ|Him.|48|79|298$عَلَيْهِ|Upon Him|81|112|395$تَوَكَّلْتُ|I put my trust|113|144|8005$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|122|2165$مَتَابِ|(is) my return."|121|137|9458$

1738.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|71|179$أَنَّ|that was|79|106|240$قُرْءَانًا|any Quran,|93|120|9459$سُيِّرَتْ|could be moved|124|151|9460$بِهِ|by it|50|77|204$ٱلْجِبَالُ|the mountains,|119|146|9461$أَوْ|or|41|54|154$قُطِّعَتْ|could be cloven asunder|181|194|9462$بِهِ|by it|50|77|204$ٱلْأَرْضُ|the earth,|92|119|589$أَوْ|or|41|68|154$كُلِّمَ|could be made to speak|178|205|9463$بِهِ|by it|50|63|204$ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ‌ۗ|the dead.|88|97|704$بَل|Nay,|50|69|848$لِّلَّهِ|with Allah|84|103|924$ٱلْأَمْرُ|(is) the command|136|155|5439$جَمِيعًا‌ۗ|all.|78|97|300$أَفَلَمْ|Then do not|101|120|9302$يَاْيْــَٔسِ|know|76|85|9464$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|102|20$ءَامَنُوٓاْ|believe|82|108|84$أَن|that|48|74|655$لَّوْ|if|41|67|905$يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah had willed|121|147|9465$لَهَدَى|surely, He would have guided|214|227|9466$ٱلنَّاسَ جَمِيعًا‌ۗ|all of the mankind?|144|158|4927$وَلَا|And not|72|100|25$يَزَالُ|will cease|84|112|7913$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|117|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|112|59$تُصِيبُهُم|to strike them|113|127|9467$بِمَا|for what|76|86|43$صَنَعُواْ|they did|89|108|8411$قَارِعَةٌ|a disaster,|90|109|9468$أَوْ|or|41|60|154$تَحُلُّ|it settles|79|98|9469$قَرِيبًا|close|68|87|7604$مِّن|from|50|69|53$دَارِهِمْ|their homes|97|107|6562$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|77|526$يَأْتِىَ|comes|62|87|2261$وَعْدُ ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(the) Promise of Allah.|168|193|9470$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|95|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|78|184$لَا|(will) not|79|104|30$يُخْلِفُ|fail|77|90|2640$ٱلْمِيعَادَ|(in) the Promise.|130|130|2641$

1739.verse: وَلَقَدِ|And certainly,|112|131|1192$ٱسْتُهْزِئَ|were mocked|107|144|5445$بِرُسُلٍ|Messengers|97|134|5446$مِّن قَبْلِكَ|before you,|102|139|47$فَأَمْلَيْتُ|but I granted respite|158|177|9471$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|114|750$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved;|98|110|59$ثُمَّ|then|50|62|293$أَخَذْتُهُمْ‌ۖ|I seized them,|114|126|9472$فَكَيْفَ|and how|76|88|2727$كَانَ|was|57|69|913$عِقَابِ|My penalty.|98|104|9473$

1740.verse: أَفَمَنْ هُوَ|Is then He Who|123|132|9474$قَآئِمٌ|(is) a Maintainer|128|145|2823$عَلَىٰ|of|63|80|52$كُلِّ|every|57|74|185$نَفْسِۭ|soul|62|79|2507$بِمَا|for what|76|93|43$كَسَبَتْ‌ۗ|it has earned?|114|122|1265$وَجَعَلُواْ|Yet they ascribe|130|138|5896$لِلَّهِ|to Allah|70|86|6$شُرَكَآءَ|partners.|86|102|5897$قُلْ|Say,|50|66|765$سَمُّوهُمْ‌ۚ|"Name them.|104|120|9475$أَمْ|Or|38|54|62$تُنَبِّــُٔونَهُۥ|(do) you inform Him|150|158|9476$بِمَا|of what|71|84|43$لَا|not|42|67|30$يَعْلَمُ|He knows|83|108|742$فِى|in|48|73|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|117|100$أَم|or|38|63|62$بِظَـٰهِرٍ|of the apparent|124|149|9477$مِّنَ|of|50|63|156$ٱلْقَوْلِ‌ۗ|the words?"|98|109|4429$بَلْ|Nay,|50|71|848$زُيِّنَ|(is) made fair-seeming|168|189|1846$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|129|750$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|105|59$مَكْرُهُمْ|their plotting,|110|121|9478$وَصُدُّواْ|and they are hindered|166|175|9479$عَنِ|from|54|72|1663$ٱلسَّبِيلِ‌ۗ|the Path.|83|101|1019$وَمَن|And whoever|106|124|1012$يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ|Allah lets go astray|148|166|4277$فَمَا|then not|77|86|132$لَهُۥ|for him|65|190|977$مِنْ|any|50|300|53$هَادٍ|guide.|60|185|9349$

1741.verse: لَّهُمْ|For them|79|86|98$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|150|72$فِى|in|48|63|89$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|the life|82|97|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا‌ۖ|(of) the world|112|127|818$وَلَعَذَابُ|and surely the punishment|195|202|9480$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|(of) the Hereafter|139|153|978$أَشَقُّ‌ۖ|(is) harder.|94|123|9481$وَمَا|And not|72|101|46$لَهُم|for them|76|105|98$مِّنَ|against|68|97|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|82|606$مِن|any|50|64|53$وَاقٍ|defender.|83|83|9482$

1736.verse: Those who have believed and done righteous deeds - a good state is theirs and a good return.

1737.verse: Thus have We sent you to a community before which [other] communities have passed on so you might recite to them that which We revealed to you, while they disbelieve in the Most Merciful. Say, "He is my Lord; there is no deity except Him. Upon Him I rely, and to Him is my return."

1738.verse: And if there was any qur'an by which the mountains would be removed or the earth would be broken apart or the dead would be made to speak, [it would be this Qur'an], but to Allah belongs the affair entirely. Then have those who believed not accepted that had Allah willed, He would have guided the people, all of them? And those who disbelieve do not cease to be struck, for what they have done, by calamity - or it will descend near their home - until there comes the promise of Allah. Indeed, Allah does not fail in [His] promise.

1739.verse: And already were [other] messengers ridiculed before you, and I extended the time of those who disbelieved; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.

1740.verse: Then is He who is a maintainer of every soul, [knowing] what it has earned, [like any other]? But to Allah they have attributed partners. Say, "Name them. Or do you inform Him of that which He knows not upon the earth or of what is apparent of speech?" Rather, their [own] plan has been made attractive to those who disbelieve, and they have been averted from the way. And whomever Allah leaves astray - there will be for him no guide.

1741.verse: For them will be punishment in the life of [this] world, and the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe. And they will not have from Allah any protector.
